beaten.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a beaten path, track etc has been made by many people walking the same way
beaten.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: a well-beaten path through the forest
beaten.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a beaten person feels defeated and not respected
beaten.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: a beaten man who had lost his job
beaten.translation[0].definitions[2].def: beaten metal has been shaped with a hammer to make it thinner
